name: B0NCE
description:
B0NCE is a 2d platformer game made with the objective of being completed fast.

Since there are no ways to die, the player's goal is to beat his fastest time, in order to do so, it's required to make fast and precise movements, and, combined with physics makes a quite hard game.

In order to control the player drag your mouse toward the opposite direction of the destination (Almost like a slingshot) and release to fire.
